divs: sighting detailsi was awakened by an extremely bright white light outside my second floor bedroom window - there were no curtains on the window. i got out of bed and went to the window to see why it was so bright at that time of night. a huge disc was moving slowly west to east -- silently. the disc had very bright white lights shining from underneath (app. 150 yards away). it was as bright as daylight. blue circular lights were on the lower portion, outer perimeter - it could have been portholes with blue light from inside the craft; the blue light did not shine as brightly as the white light-it couldn't be seen as readily. in between the blue "portholes" were what appeared to me to be rivets but to be that visible they had to have been rather large. the disc was about the length of a football field (100 yds) with the height about 1\3 the length. it was descending as though landing but i was unable to view a "landing" because a stand of trees interfered with my view to the left. so i don't know if it landed or took off. once it passed my window the bright light was gone; i couldn't see much farther across the road and to the left. the area at the time was not well populated although now it is a very busy suburb of philadelphia. the area across the road was open fields with trees lining the road on the eastern end of the field. there was no traffic, in those days, at that time of night. i remember checking the clock but i don't remember if it was when i awoke or when i returned to bed; i knew i had to remember the time and the date although i never told anyone in my family about it. my brothers' bedrooms were in the back of the house and mine was in the front; no one else was awake or stirring in the house. i had no doubt that i had seen a craft that was "different".
Summary: Bright, silent angled descent of huge disc
